entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 10:08 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
